entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 later in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
